nodes.bodyText:
Style: I think it's premature to call the current code legacy until EIP1559 is adopted.  I think there are two alternatives

Keep the guard block, but have it switch to readFromExperimental and keep the current operations as the main text
Hav two new methods readFromFrontier and readFromEIP1559 (to be renamed readFrom<fork> when assigned) and switch in the current readFrom method.
Ok. Will go with the first alternative
Style: move the comment as the first line of the else block to preserve the } else { text.
Why did this line get deteled?
missing it will default to any chain. from original decleration.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -151,6 +213,35 @@ public Transaction( this.chainId = chainId; } + /** + * Instantiates a transaction instance. + * + * @param nonce the nonce + * @param gasPrice the gas price + * @param gasLimit the gas limit + * @param to the transaction recipient + * @param value the value being transferred to the recipient + * @param signature the signature + * @param payload the payload + * @param sender the transaction sender + * @param chainId the chain id to apply the transaction to + *

The {@code to} will be an {@code Optional.empty()} for a contract creation transaction; + * otherwise it should contain an address. + *

The {@code chainId} must be greater than 0 to be applied to a specific chain; otherwise + */

@@ -151,6 +213,35 @@ public Transaction( this.chainId = chainId; } + /** + * Instantiates a transaction instance. + * + * @param nonce the nonce + * @param gasPrice the gas price + * @param gasLimit the gas limit + * @param to the transaction recipient + * @param value the value being transferred to the recipient + * @param signature the signature + * @param payload the payload + * @param sender the transaction sender + * @param chainId the chain id to apply the transaction to + *

The {@code to} will be an {@code Optional.empty()} for a contract creation transaction; + * otherwise it should contain an address. + *

The {@code chainId} must be greater than 0 to be applied to a specific chain; otherwise + */

@@ -151,6 +213,35 @@ public Transaction( this.chainId = chainId; } + /** + * Instantiates a transaction instance. + * + * @param nonce the nonce + * @param gasPrice the gas price + * @param gasLimit the gas limit + * @param to the transaction recipient + * @param value the value being transferred to the recipient + * @param signature the signature + * @param payload the payload + * @param sender the transaction sender + * @param chainId the chain id to apply the transaction to + *

The {@code to} will be an {@code Optional.empty()} for a contract creation transaction; + * otherwise it should contain an address. + *

The {@code chainId} must be greater than 0 to be applied to a specific chain; otherwise + */

Should be a default method and @Unstable
